name: CCRI 1911 Census of Canada: Aggregate data and geography = CCRI 1911 Recensement du Canada: Données agrégées et cadre géographique
description: This study includes two components of the research infrastructure developed by CCRI for the 1911 Census of Canada: selected digitized published tables of aggregate data and a reconstruction of the census geography.

distribution.name: CCRI_Canada_CD_1911_ESRI_Metadata.pdf
distribution.description: ESRI metadata in .pdf format for the 1911 Census division (CD) polygon files.

distribution.name: CCRI_Canada_CSD_1911_ESRI_Metadata.pdf
distribution.description: ESRI metadata in .pdf format for the 1911 Census subdivision (CSD) polygon files.

distribution.name: CCRI_digitized_published_tables.pdf
distribution.description: Summary of all tables from the 1911 to 1951 censuses digitized by the CCRI.

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1911_v1t1.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1911, Vol. 1, Table 1. Title: Area and population of Canada by provinces, districts and subdistricts in 1911 and population in 1901. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1911. Fifth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 1, Table 1, pp. 2-172. Basic unit of geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1911_v1t2.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1911, Vol. 1, Table 2. Title: Conjugal condition of the people, classified as single, married, widowed, divorced, legally separated and not given, by districts and sub-districts. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1911. Fifth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 1, Table 2, pp. 174-511. Basic unit of geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1911_v2t28.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1911, Vol. 2, Table 28. Title: Literacy of total population 5 years of age and over. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1911. Fifth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 28, pp. 462-466. Basic unit of geography: Census district (CD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1911_v2t2.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1911, Vol. 2, Table 2. Title: Religions of the people. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1911. Fifth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 2, pp. 5-147. Basic unit of geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: ccri_pub_1911_v2t7.xls
distribution.description: Table: 1911, volume 2, table 7. Title: Origins of the people by sub-districts. Source: Canada. Dominion Bureau of Statistics. 1911. Fifth Census of Canada. Ottawa: King's Printer, Vol. 2, Table 7, pp. 162-331. Basic unit of geography: Census subdistrict (CSD).

distribution.name: CCRI_Shapefiles_CD_1911.zip
distribution.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography  for the 1911 at the Census division (CD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.

distribution.name: CCRI_Shapefiles_CSD_1911.zip
distribution.description: Boundary polygon files in ESRI "shape file" format that reconstruct the census compilation and dissemination geography for the 1911 Census at the Census subdivision (CSD) level of geography. A NAP metadata record in .xml format is included.

distribution.name: CCRI_User_Guide_excerpts.pdf
distribution.description: Excerpts from the CCRI User Guide relevant to the geographic and aggregate data components of the CCRI.

distribution.name: IRCS_guide_d'usage_extraits.pdf
distribution.description: Extraits du guide d'usage de l'IRCS reliés aux éléments du c​adre géographique et de l'ensemble de données agrégées de l'IRCS.

distribution.name: IRCS_tableaux_publiés_numérisés.pdf
distribution.description: Sommaire de tous les tableaux des recensements de 1911 à 1951 numérisés par l'IRCS.

distribution.name: Reference_Maps_1911.zip
distribution.description: A collection of maps in .pdf format detailing the 1911 census geography for each province.

distribution.name: v1t1_1911.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1911, Vol. 1, Table 1.

distribution.name: v1t2_1911.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1911, Vol. 1, Table 2.

distribution.name: v2t2_1911.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1911, Vol. 2, Table 2.

distribution.name: v2t28_1911.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1911, Vol. 2, Table 28.

distribution.name: v2t7_1911.pdf
distribution.description: Description of variables in 1911, Vol. 2, Table 7.
